body: The wall's hardness increases to 40, and its hit points increase to 30 per caster level. A non-mythic disintegrate spell or rod of cancellation negates a 10-foot-square section of a mythic wall of force for 1 round, after which the wall reforms at full strength. One side of the wall (chosen by you) repels creatures within 5 feet as a repulsion spell (using the DC wall of force would have if it allowed a saving throw).
name: Wall Of Force, Mythic
